ovdesc.p: IS.COST.TYPE is the table to define the various costs incurred during purchase of an asset.
All the possible additional cost incurred during the process of purchase is defined in this table.

desc.p: The FT.CHARGE.TYPE or FT.COMMISSION.TYPE can be specified in order to default the charge amount for the cost in the Purchase contract.
1. Valid values are FT.CHARGE.TYPE or FT.COMMISSION.TYPE codes.
The description about the cost incurred.
The ID of the table IS.COST.TYPE is a numeric value from 1-999. These are Cost Type Codes defined during purchase.
Contains all the override messages which the user has confirmed during input.

During Commit, the system may generate a series of screen override messages waiting for User Approval. If the record is subsequently displayed or printed, all override messages are shown in this field.
Defines the status of the cost.
The values to the field are defined in the EB.LOOKUP table with prefix "IS.STATUS*".
1. Valid values like Active, Inactive are defined in the EB.LOOKUP table with prefix "IS.STATUS*".
